secTitle: Impact Stories. See Where the Money Donated To Summit University Goes

dataList.postTitle: A New Sherif Is Now in Town
dataList.postExcerpt: Summit University, Offa has appointed Prof. Abiodun Musa Aibinu as the university's new vice-chancellor.
The family of Alhaja Adiat Abegbe Makanjuola gifted a 500-capacity Lecture Theatre to Summit in her name.
Ibrahim Moronfolu was presented the prestigious Professor Oyawoye Prize for the Best Pioneer Student.

dataList.postTitle: Dr Babalakin Donates 30 Workstations to the E-Library.
dataList.postExcerpt: Dr. B.O. Babalakin SAN, OFR donated 30 workstations to the University's E-Library.
A 60 Bed-space Hostel was donated by ADSN Lagos State Council to Summit University.
